title: Smart Data Models - OverexcLimX1
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Field voltage over excitation limiter.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be OverexcLimX1

efd1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Low voltage point on the inverse time characteristic (EFD).  Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0.0

efd2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Mid voltage point on the inverse time characteristic (EFD).  Typical Value = 1.2. Default: 0.0

efd3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. High voltage point on the inverse time characteristic (EFD).  Typical Value = 1.5. Default: 0.0

efddes.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Desired field voltage (EFD).  Typical Value = 0.9. Default: 0.0

efdrated.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rated field voltage (EFD).  Typical Value = 1.05. Default: 0.0

kmx.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain (K).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time to trip the exciter at the low voltage point on the inverse time characteristic (TIME).  Typical Value = 120. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time to trip the exciter at the mid voltage point on the inverse time characteristic (TIME).  Typical Value = 40. Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time to trip the exciter at the high voltage point on the inverse time characteristic (TIME).  Typical Value = 15. Default: 0

vlow.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Low voltage limit (V) (>0). Default: 0.0
